attributes.action: This government immediately cease its racist treatment of the English population in favouring Scottish projects and welfare which the English fund and subsidise through taxation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current government heirarchy which consists of a - disproportionate number of Scottish members - is requiring the taxpayers of England to pay for many welfare services in Scotland which are denied to residents of England. This attitude is racist and discriminatory.
Whilst the additional welfare, health and education benefits available in Scotland are commendable, families in England are denied these services yet are required to pay for them.
